newsitem.title: NETHERLANDS: BT Office Products to buy Dutch Kuipers.
newsitem.headline: BT Office Products to buy Dutch Kuipers.

text.p: Paper, office supplies and printing equipment group NV Koninklijke KNP BT said on Tuesday its 70-percent owned unit BT Office Products had agreed in principle to buy Dutch office supplies firm Kuipers Centrum voor Kantoorefficiency.
No financial details of the transaction were disclosed.
"With annual turnover of 115 million guilders and 300 employees, Kuipers is one of the fastest growing Dutch companies in the office products segment," KNP BT said in a statement.

Kuipers is headquartered in the northeastern town of Zwolle and has five other outlets in the northern and central Netherlands. The company aims at an accelerated expansion in the rest of the country, KNP BT said.
It added the transaction is expected to be finalised at the end of the year.
